sentence.Network_en: Outside, Bruce glanced at his watch: "Dear me, nearly oneo'clock."
sentence.Network_cn: 出了门，布鲁斯瞥了一眼自己的手表，“天哪，快一点了。”

sentence.Network_en: Bruce had gone to bed, but they rousted him out.
sentence.Network_cn: 布鲁斯已经上床睡觉了，但是他们把他又叫了起来。

sentence.Network_en: Bruce Springsteen has re-hired his muso collective, the E Street Band.
sentence.Network_cn: 布鲁斯·斯普林斯汀重新组建了他的音乐团队，E街乐队。

means.word_mean: 1. Australian physician and bacteriologist who described the bacterium that causes undulant fever or brucellosis (1855-1931)
2. King of Scotland from 1306 to 1329; defeated the English army under Edward II at Bannockburn and gained recognition of Scottish independence (1274-1329)
